document.full_text: china's detention of internationally acclaimed artist ai weiwei has provoked a petition urging his release, exposing growing alarm among the country's liberal intellectuals who see him as a test of how far a wave of detentions to stifle dissent could go.
document.title: china artist's detention tests depth of crackdown
lines_and_colors: china's detention of internationally acclaimed artist ai weiwei has provoked a petition urging his release, exposing growing alarm among the country's liberal intellectuals who see him as a test of how far a wave of detentions to stifle dissent could go.
